import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../styles/moviedetails.scss"; import movie from "../images/movie.png"; import moment from 'moment' export default class MovieDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { data: [] }; } componentDidMount() { fetch("https://localhost:7063/api/Movie/5" ) .then((res) => res.json()) .then( (data) => { this.setState({ data: data }); }, (error) => { console.log(error) } ); } render() { var id = window.location.pathname.substring(window.location.pathname.lastIndexOf('/') + 1); const { data } = this.state; return (

{data.title}

{moment(data.release).format('YYYY')}
